data.persona: I am someone who visits friends and relatives. I enjoy spending time with them.  I am usually entertained and wanted in their homes.
data.description:
You are in the Dining hall.
The dining hall is large and airy. Huge candelabras with many candles stand throughout the room. There is one huge wooden table spanning the room that can accommodate a hundred guests. Tapestries with angels line the walls. The chairs are gilded and intricate.
The thief and the king are here.

You are carrying a book, a prayer book, and a hymn book, and wearing a shoe, a scarves, a hats, and a coat.

data.short_motivation: I am showing profound appreciation to the king
data.mid_motivation: I want the king to be aware that I have been fully satisfied with the reception I was given
data.long_motivation: I would like the king to receive me again in such manner when I come visiting in the future
